name: Neon Copy
description:
The main mechanic is changing colors with mouse one and mouse two. If you are the same color as an object you can pass through it. This includes enemies which are copies of you that run around the stage. The goal of each level to reach the next colored pit.

Warning! The title screen is NOT controller friendly it requires a mouse.

Controls

A, Left Joystick = Right

L, Left Joystick = Left

W, Space, A Button = Jump

R, Right Rumper = Reset

Music

Feels - Patrick Patrikios

Lands Unknown - Futuremono

Two Moons - Bobby Richards
